allRewardDescription: Selected reward flights from Australia travelling in one direction only, 2pax. Availability may be limited. Register for daily alerts and to view itineraries beyond 60 days.
allAustralianFlightsDescription: Selected Business & First Class flights to & from the major Australian airports. Use the column headings below to sort by date, destination, class of travel and more.
allRewardFooterLine1: RewardFlights.io is the fastest and easiest way to search and discover Business Class & First Class Qantas Classic Reward flights & Velocity Reward Flights. Fly Business Class on airlines such as Qantas, ANA, Singapore Airlines, Qatar, Emirates and more. RewardFlights.io does the hard discovery work and centralises reward flights into a simple, intuitive interface. Search popular routes and register for alerts that match your desired destination and class of travel.
allRewardFooterLine2: This site is offered up for information and entertainment purposes only. Reward flight data is an aggregate of GDS, airline point tables, calculators and other 3rd party sources. Data is pulled periodically and not in real time. No guarantee of flight availability or accuracy of information. Not all flight options may be shown. Reward flights are dynamic, available to all partner airlines and can disappear at any time. Not affiliated with any airline. No investment or financial advice offered.
allRewardFooterLine3: Simplifying reward flight discovery. contact [at] rewardflights.io

table.qantasBookItem1: Login to Qantas and ensure you have the required points balance
table.qantasBookItem2: Find the corresponding flight on the Qantas website:
table.qantasBookItem2_3: Ensure 'Use points - Classic Flight Rewards only' option is selected
table.qantasBookItem2_4: Open the date picker and ensure 'Flexible with dates for all flights' is selected. Find the flight and make the booking
table.velocityBookItem1: Navigate to the Virgin Australia website
table.velocityBookItem2: Enter your departure and destination airports:
table.velocityBookItem2_1: Select departure date and choose 'One Way'
table.velocityBookItem2_4: Ensure you have toggled the 'Points' button to show the reward flights. Login and make the booking
table.empty: No reward flights found. Use the date picker to find the next available flights for this route. Coloured segments around the date represent reward availability.
table.pointsLabel: Min points required to travel this route in the lowest fare class found.
table.maxAlertReached: Create an account or upgrade plan to setup flight alerts for this route.

60daysAlert.header: For detailed reward search and flight alerts, please login or create an account.
60daysAlert.text: We support searching up to a year in advance for registered users

howToBookAvios.subheader: This reward flight may be available via British Airways.
howToBookAvios.bookItem1: Go to the BA website and choose 'Log in to my Executive Club'
howToBookAvios.bookItem3: Flight the corresponding flight under the 'Book with Avios' tab

flyModal.bonusSub: * signup bonus subject to min spend targets. T&C'S apply.
flyModal.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: New AMEX customers only. Use the link above to complete sign up & secure the bonus. Check the card T&C's in full to ensure eligibility. Points may be earned on successful card referrals. Not financial advice.

alertRouteModal.createToastError: Error creating Alert. Please try again later
alertRouteModal.editToastError: Error editing Alert. Please try again later

alerts.deleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this alert?
alerts.empty: You don't have any alerts. You can add some on 'All Availability' page.

terms.paragraph1: The following terms and conditions govern all use of the RewardFlights website and all content, services and products available at or through the website. The Website is operated by RewardFlights. The Website is offered subject to your acceptance without modification of all of the terms and conditions contained herein and all other operating rules, policies and procedures that may be published from time to time on this Site by RewardFlights.io (collectively, the "Agreement".)
terms.paragraph2: Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using the Website. By accessing or using any part of the web site, you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the Website or use any services. If these terms and conditions are considered an offer by RewardFlights, acceptance is expressly limited to these terms.
terms.servicesParagraph1: RewardFlights makes it easy for travelers with frequent flyer points to find and plan reward flights. RewardFlights is not a travel agent nor do we issue airline tickets or sell any other travel products. Any suitable reward availability displayed on the website needs to be booked directly with the airline. We do not sell or claim ownership of reward availability data. A monthly or annual subscription allows searching for flights up to a year in advance and automated alerts via email or SMS.
terms.servicesParagraph2: RewardFlights.io offers paid subscriptions for $19.99 AUD a month or $199.99 AUD a year, processed and handled by Stripe. Registered users are able to access features such as searching routes and availability up to a year in advance and availability alerts. These features are subject to change. Subscriptions may be canceled at any time via Stripe but are not refundable. Logins may not be shared or used in an automated fashion. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate this without any refund.
terms.servicesParagraph3: RewardFlights provides services for personal use only, through manual searching only (no automated searches). You agree that you will not use any robot, spider, scraper, deep link or other similar automated data gathering or extraction tools, program, algorithm or methodology to access, acquire, copy or monitor our Services or any portion of our Services or for any other purpose, without our prior written permission.
terms.datasourceParagraph1: The Service combines data from a number of sources including GDS, as well as public facing airline points calculators & other 3rd parties. The data displayed may not be real time and in some cases, certain flights may no longer be available at the time of viewing. When the sources of data are combined there may be errors or inaccuracies including number of points and/or taxes required for certain routes. In some cases certain flights and routing may be omitted and in some instances data may be manually gathered.
terms.datasourceParagraph2: You must not rely on the Service as your sole source of information before making a decision to transfer or purchase points, make travel bookings, or perform any other action. The Service also cannot prevent or detect "phantom" availability, which is availability that may not exist even if both the Service and the respective airline or mileage program claim it is available.
terms.datasourceParagraph3: You must not depend on the Service's alerting features as your sole source of information. The alerting features may experience interruptions, downtime, or temporarily become unable to obtain new availability from certain airlines or mileage programs. The alerting features use the same data as the Website displays and are subject to the same potential issues with phantom availability.
terms.useParagraph1: Your right to access and use our Services is personal to you and is not transferable by you to any other person or entity. You are only entitled to access and use our Services for lawful purposes and pursuant to the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Privacy Policy.
terms.useParagraph2: Your access and use of our Services may be interrupted from time to time for any of several reasons, including, without limitation, the malfunction of equipment, periodic updating, maintenance or repair of our Services or other actions that we, in our sole discretion, may elect to take. We reserve the right to suspend or discontinue the availability of our Services and/or any portion or feature of our Services at any time in our sole discretion and without prior notice.
terms.useParagraph3: Any action by you that, in our sole discretion: (i) violates the terms and conditions of this Agreement and/or the Privacy Policy; (ii) restricts, inhibits or prevents any access, use or enjoyment of our Services; or (iii) through the use of our Services, defames, abuses, harasses, offends or threatens, shall not be permitted, and may result in your loss of the right to access and use our Services. You shall not modify, scrape, embed, or frame our Services without our prior written permission.
terms.useParagraph4: You Acknowledge and Agree that We are not a financial institution or other Service Provider. Instead, we, through our Services, may help to connect you with Service Providers that might meet your needs based on information provided by you. We do not, and will not, make any coverage or credit decision with any Service Provider referred to you. We do not issue credit cards or any other financial products.
terms.disclaimerParagraph1: The Website is provided "as is". RewardFLights and its suppliers and licensors hereby disclaim all warranties of any kind, express or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. Neither RewardFlights nor its suppliers and licensors, makes any warranty that the Website will be error free or that access thereto will be continuous or uninterrupted. You understand that you obtain content or services through the Website at your own discretion and risk.
terms.disclaimerParagraph2: The information provided on this page is a compilation and reconciliation of data from different sources including flight booking systems (GDS), airline point tables/calculators and other third-party data providers. In some instances there may be errors in the number of points and taxes required. The data is provided as is, there are no guarantees that the information is fully correct or up to date. The service may include 'phantom' availability and in some cases display availability when there is none. Changes and errors may occur. RewardFlights cannot be held liable either for the accuracy of the information or for ensuring that the information is up to date. Any appearances of an organization's name or logo on this website are for informational and/or attribution purposes only, and do not imply an affiliation or approval by that organization.
terms.limitationParagraph1: In no event will RewardFlights, or its suppliers or licensors, be liable with respect to any subject matter of this agreement under any contract, negligence, strict liability or other legal or equitable theory for: (i) any special, incidental or consequential damages; (ii) the cost of procurement for substitute products or services; (iii) for interruption of use or loss or corruption of data; or (iv) for any amounts that exceed the fees paid by you to RewardFlights under this agreement during the twelve (12) month period prior to the cause of action. RewardFlights shall have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond their reasonable control. The foregoing shall not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law.
terms.warrantyParagraph: You represent and warrant that (i) your use of the Website will be in strict accordance with the RewardFlights Privacy Policy, with this Agreement and with all applicable laws and regulations (including without limitation any local laws or regulations in your country, state, city, or other governmental area, regarding online conduct and acceptable content, and including all applicable laws regarding the transmission of technical data exported from country in which you reside) and (ii) your use of the Website will not infringe or misappropriate the intellectual property rights of any third party.
terms.indemnificationParagraph1: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless RewardsFlights, its contractors, and its licensors, and their respective directors, officers, employees and agents from and against any and all claims and expenses, including attorneys' fees, arising out of your use of the Website, including but not limited to your violation of this Agreement.
terms.indemnificationParagraph2: Please contact contact@rewardflights.io with any questions

privacy.paragraph1: This Privacy Policy describes the policies and procedures of RewardFlights (“RewardFlights”, “we”, “our” or “us”) on the collection, use and disclosure of your information on rewardflights.io (the “Site”) and the services, features, content or applications we offer (collectively with the Site, the “Services”). We may receive information about you from various sources, including: (i) if you register for the Site and the Services, through a user account on the Services (your “Account”); (ii) your use of the Services generally; and (iii) from third party websites and services. When you use the Services, you are consenting to the collection, transfer, manipulation, storage, disclosure and other uses of your information as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.coverSubheader: What Does This Privacy Policy Cover?
privacy.coverParagraph1: This Privacy Policy covers the treatment of personally identifiable information (“Personal Information”) gathered when you are using or accessing the Services. This Privacy Policy also covers our treatment of any Personal Information that our business partners share with us or that we share with our business partners.
privacy.coverParagraph2: This Privacy Policy does not apply to the practices of third parties that we do not own or control, including but not limited to any third party websites, services and applications (“Third Party Services”) that you may access through the Services or to individuals that we do not manage or employ. We cannot take responsibility for the content or privacy policies of those Third Party Services. We encourage you to carefully review the privacy policies of any Third Party Services you access.
privacy.collectParagraph1: The information we gather enables us to personalize, improve and continue to operate the Services. In connection with certain aspects of the Services, we may request, collect and/or display some of your Personal Information. We may collect the following types of information from our users.
privacy.addressSubheader: IP Address Information and Other Information Collected Automatically
privacy.addressParagraph1: We may automatically receive and record information from your web browser when you interact with the Services, including your IP address and cookie information. This information is used for fighting spam/malware and also to facilitate collection of data concerning your interaction with the Services (e.g., what links you have clicked on).
privacy.addressParagraph2: Generally, the Services may automatically collect usage information, such as the number and frequency of visitors to the Site. We may use this data in aggregate form, that is, as a statistical measure, but not in a manner that would identify you personally. This type of aggregate data enables us and third parties authorized by us to figure out how often individuals use parts of the Services so that we can analyze and improve them.
privacy.emailParagraph1: RewardFlights may send occasional promotional materials through email if you have signed up to our newsletter or explicitly provided your email address and mobile number to us. You will have the option to opt-out of these emails by responding directly inside of the email or SMS itself.
privacy.advertParagraph1: To support and enhance the Services, we may serve affiliate links to various credit card organizations.
privacy.choicesSubheader: What Choices Do I Have Regarding My Information?
privacy.choicesParagraph1: You can opt-out of anonymous data collection on our website. See Google Analytics' currently available opt-outs.

subscription.switch.text: The current plan remains in place until the next billing cycle, at which point the account will be switched over.
subscription.cancellation.text: You’re about to cancel your subscription. You’ll still have full access to search & alerts up until the end of the current billing cycle. Following that you’ll be able to search up to 60 days but for alerts and searches up to a year advance, you’ll need to re-subscribe. Thank you!
